vulnerabilities.title: Path Traversal in SecureApp Inc
vulnerabilities.description: Discovered Path traversal in file operations affecting SecureApp Inc. The application does not properly sanitize user input, allowing an attacker to inject malicious payloads that are executed by the application.
vulnerabilities.impact: An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to read arbitrary files on the server filesystem.
reproduction_steps: Observe that the payload is executed
vulnerabilities.proof_of_concept:
# Proof of Concept

Payload: ../../../etc/passwd

This demonstrates Path traversal in file operations

# Validation at 2025-11-05T13:13:27.321288
Validation successful with alternative payload at 2025-11-05T13:13:27.321284
vulnerabilities.remediation: Validate file paths against allowlist. Use secure APIs that prevent directory traversal. Implement proper access controls on filesystem operations.
